Articles.Content: so i'm about to land on duna, and i clicked something and now every engine on my ship has a big icon tab over it and the ship is completely engulfed with icons. how do i get rid of them?

go to resources> then press the bar with the white dot at the right.

ZodiaK. I hope that works.

go to resources> then press the bar with the white dot at the right.

ZodiaK. I hope that works.

Thanks it worked.
